Package no.ntnu.bildur.ui.controllers

Class ThumbnailViewController

java.lang.Object
no.ntnu.bildur.ui.controllers.ThumbnailViewController
public class ThumbnailViewController
extends java.lang.Object
The controller class for ThumbnailViewController.XML ThumbnailView will display photos as thumbnails.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    ThumbnailViewController()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    javafx.scene.image.ImageView addThumbnail​(Photo photo)
    Adds an ImageView to the thumbnails and returns the created ImageView object as a thumbnail.
    boolean addToAlbum()
    Adds teh focused Picture to the addToAlbumList.
    void clearAddToAlbumList()
    Clears the addToAlbumList.
    void displayPhotoInfo​(Photo photo)
    Takes in a photo object and displays it's information to
    the user on the right side in the app, and sets the focusedPhoto to that photo.
    void doSearch()
    It does searching, for pictures, based on user input.
    Reads the text in the search bar and displays the images that match the search.
    java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAddToAlbumList()
    Return a list with all the URLs for all the photos added to the addToAlbumList.
    javafx.collections.ListChangeListener<Photo> getListener()
    Returns a ListChangeListener so newly add pictures are added as thumbnails in the thumbnail view
    void getTagFromUser()
    Get a tag from the user and adds it to the relevant Photo
    void setPhotoArchive​(Archive archive)
    Ths method is a workaround for not being able to use a normal constructor
    as a result of using FXML.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • addThumbnail

      public javafx.scene.image.ImageView addThumbnail​(Photo photo)
      Adds an ImageView to the thumbnails and returns the created ImageView object as a thumbnail.
      Parameters:
      photo - the Photo to add.
      Returns:
      and ImageView of the Photo object as a thumbnail.

    • setPhotoArchive

      public void setPhotoArchive​(Archive archive)
      Ths method is a workaround for not being able to use a normal constructor
      as a result of using FXML. Sets this class archive so Search functions ans such can accesses it.
      Parameters:
      archive - the archive to display

    • getAddToAlbumList

      public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAddToAlbumList()
      Return a list with all the URLs for all the photos added to the addToAlbumList.
      Returns:
      list with all the URLs for all the photos added to the addToAlbumList.

    • clearAddToAlbumList

      public void clearAddToAlbumList()
      Clears the addToAlbumList.

    • doSearch

      public void doSearch()
      It does searching, for pictures, based on user input.
      Reads the text in the search bar and displays the images that match the search.

    • displayPhotoInfo

      public void displayPhotoInfo​(Photo photo)
      Takes in a photo object and displays it's information to
      the user on the right side in the app, and sets the focusedPhoto to that photo.
      Parameters:
      photo - Photo object to display.

    • addToAlbum

      public boolean addToAlbum()
      Adds teh focused Picture to the addToAlbumList.
      Returns:
      a boolean that tells if the operation was a success.

    • getTagFromUser

      public void getTagFromUser()
      Get a tag from the user and adds it to the relevant Photo

    • getListener

      public javafx.collections.ListChangeListener<Photo> getListener()
      Returns a ListChangeListener so newly add pictures are added as thumbnails in the thumbnail view
      Returns:
      ListChangeListener
